name: Sales Manager and status wise Leads
query:
select
l.lead_owner as "Lead Owner Name",
sum(case when l.status = "Open" then l.loan_amount/100000 end) as "Open(Amt. in Lakhs)::200",
sum(case when l.status = "Call Done" then l.loan_amount/100000 end) as "Call Done(Amt. in Lakhs)::200",
sum(case when l.status = "Meeting Scheduled" then l.loan_amount/100000 end) as "Meeting Scheduled(Amt. in Lakhs)::200",
sum(case when l.status = "Meeting Conducted" then l.loan_amount/100000 end) as "Meeting Conducted(Amt. in Lakhs)::200",
sum(case when l.status = "Partly Documents Collected" then l.loan_amount/100000 end) as "Partly Documents Collected(Amt. in Lakhs)::200",
sum(case when l.status = "Documents Received" then l.loan_amount/100000 end) as "Documents Received(Amt. in Lakhs)::200",
sum(case when l.status = "Lender Selection" then l.loan_amount/100000 end) as "Lender Selection(Amt. in Lakhs)::200",
sum(case when l.status = "Pending For Reporting Manager Approval" then l.loan_amount/100000 end) as "Pending For Reporting Manager Approval(Amt. in Lakhs)::200",
sum(case when l.status = "Login Done" then l.loan_amount/100000 end) as "Login Done(Amt. in Lakhs)::200",
sum(case when l.status = "Additional Doc Required" then l.loan_amount/100000 end) as "Additional Doc Required(Amt. in Lakhs)::200",
sum(case when l.status = "Sanctioned" then l.loan_amount/100000 end) as "Sanctioned(Amt. in Lakhs)::200",
sum(case when l.status = "Disbursement Doc List" then l.loan_amount/100000 end) as "Disbursement Doc List(Amt. in Lakhs)::200",
sum(case when l.status = "Disbursement Doc Submitted" then l.loan_amount/100000 end) as "Disbursement Doc Submitted(Amt. in Lakhs)::200",
sum(case when l.status = "Disbursed" then l.loan_amount/100000 end) as "Disbursed(Amt. in Lakhs)::200",
sum(case when l.status = "Amount Credited" then l.loan_amount/100000 end) as "Amount Credited(Amt. in Lakhs)::200",
sum(case when l.status = "Lead" then l.loan_amount/100000 end) as "Lead(Amt. in Lakhs)::200",
sum(case when l.status = "Replied" then l.loan_amount/100000 end) as "Replied(Amt. in Lakhs)::200",
sum(case when l.status = "Opportunity" then l.loan_amount/100000 end) as "Opportunity(Amt. in Lakhs)::200",
sum(case when l.status = "Quotation" then l.loan_amount/100000 end) as "Quotation(Amt. in Lakhs)::200",
sum(case when l.status = "Lost Quotation" then l.loan_amount/100000 end) as "Lost Quotation(Amt. in Lakhs)::200"
from `tabLead` l
where l.lead_owner is not null and date(l.creation) >= %(from_date)s and date(l.creation) <= %(to_date)s
group by l.lead_owner
report_name: Sales Manager and status wise Leads
